full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for Client Facilitation Services
## Overview

Government of Canada, represented by Natural Resources Canada (NRCan), invites qualified companies to deliver Client Facilitation Services on an "as and when requested" basis. These services aim to support client organizations in planning, developing, and implementing major energy efficiency and GHG initiatives.

### Scope of Work

* Consult on energy management, measurement and verification (M&V), renewables, and energy performance contracts to achieve Government of Canada's Sustainable Development Strategy (FSDS) targets.
* Provide strategic planning consultation services on energy or utility consulting services.
* Offer energy conservation services to support client organizations in meeting project goals and objectives.

### Procurement Details
* Reference Number: cb-184-84881987
* Solicitation Number: 5000075549
* Tender Status: Expired
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: December 31, 2029

### Preference to Trade Agreements
This procurement is open to tender under the Comprehensive Guide to Government of Canada Trade Agreements that benefit Canadian companies.

### Legal Requirements
All vendors must comply with the [terms and conditions](tenderDescription) of the procurement, which include requirements for bid preparation, evaluation, and contract management.
